price: Setelah itu, Kami bangkitkan kamu sesudah kamu mati52 supaya kamu bersyukur.
arabic: ثُمَّ بَعَثۡنَٰكُم مِّنۢ بَعۡدِ مَوۡتِكُمۡ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَشۡكُرُونَ
footnotes: 52.  Yang dimaksud dengan "mati" di sini menurut sebagian mufasir ialah mati yang sebenarnya, dan menurut sebagian yang lain ialah pingsan akibat sambaran halilintar.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: thumma baʿathnākum min baʿdi mawtikum laʿallakum tashkurūna
